title: Properly namespace all remaining used translation keys
body:
# Problem

#17610 introduced linting of the usage of translation keys in `i18n/label` expressions through clj-kondo. This linting rule requires translation keywords to use the `:t/` namespace.

However, this method does not catch all the usages of `i18n/label` (e.g. through intermediary functions). #17735 created a script to (amongst other things) find such occurrences, but their actual fixing has been moved to this separate issue as there are so many of them (there are still 388 non-namespaced keywords in `src` that match the keys in `translations/en.json`.)

We would like all of the ones actually used for translation to be namespaced with `t:/`.

## List of  keys
Here are the keys in `translations/en.json` that are probably used as non-namespaced keywords in `src`:

**Note**: see [this comment](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17735#issuecomment-1793437127) - after #17814 there should only be 41 keys left.

## Implementation

Uncomment the relevant expressions in `scripts/lint_translations.clj`, in particular the line to print out the individual occurrences of the non-namespaced keyword usages.

Inspect the code to find where 

## Notes

Even once `scripts/lint_translations.clj` does not print "Probably non-namespaced translation keyword usage" warnings any more, it does not mean that there still aren't any non-namespaced keywords passed to `i18n/label`. It simply means, that any translation key in `translations/en.json` that's actually used inside `src`, is used with the namespace `:t/` at least once.

We would still need a `:pre` condition for `i18n/label`, or malli instrumentation to catch all the bad usages. See https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17735#issuecomment-1792593032

## Future Steps

Once all non-namespaced translation keyword usages have been resolved, we can proceed to removing all unused translation keys (#17813).

Once both #17811 and #17813 are solved, we can remove the functionality to list non-namespaced translation keys from `scripts/lint_translations.clj`.
